TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageAdapter extends System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter
Public MustInherit Class PageAdapter Inherits ControlAdapter

summary.span: 修改网页以适应特定的浏览器，并提供所有页面适配器可直接或间接继承的基类。

span.span: Adapts a Web page for a specific browser and provides the base class from which all page adapters inherit, directly or indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个抽象类，用于改编特定浏览器类（由浏览器使用的标记语言定义） (例如，HTML 或 XHTML) 的网页。The class is an abstract class that adapts a Web page for a specific class of browsers, defined by the markup language that the browser uses (for example, HTML or XHTML). 呈现行为中的大部分适应性都可以封装在派生自类的专用文本编写器类中 ，因此，并不总是需要提供页适配器。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized text writer classes that derive from the class, so it is not always necessary to provide a page adapter. 派生页适配器的大部分成员都是从 类或从控件适配器调用的。Most members of derived page adapters are called from the class or from control adapters. 首先， 类或控件适配器检测是否存在派生的页适配器，然后调用该成员，如果页适配器不存在，则提供此功能。First, the class or control adapters detect the presence of the derived page adapter, and then call the member, or provide the functionality if the page adapter is not present. 类的成员 提供以下功能：The members of the class provide the following functionality: - 和 属性定义 `GET` `POST` 可用于改变缓存的其他 HTTP 标头和 http 和参数。The and properties define additional HTTP headers and HTTP `GET` and `POST` parameters that can be used to vary caching. 在从类进行缓存初始化期间调用它们 。They are called during cache initialization from the class. - 方法返回一个对象，该对象可用于持久保存页面的组合视图和控件状态。The method returns an object that can be used to persist the combined view and control states of the page. 如果存在派生页适配器，则从属性中引用它。It is referenced from the property if a derived page adapter is present. - 方法提供了一个 DHTML 代码片段，可用于在脚本中引用窗体。The method provides a DHTML code fragment that can be used to reference forms in scripts. - 如果该页处于回发，则该方法返回回发变量的集合。The method returns a collection of the postback variables if the page is in postback. 如果存在派生页适配器，则由 .NET Framework 而不是方法来调用它 。It is called by the .NET Framework instead of the method if a derived page adapter is present. - 如果存在派生页适配器，控件适配器将使用和方法来呈现超链接。The and methods are used by control adapters to render hyperlinks if a derived page adapter is present. - 方法呈现可以提交窗体的超链接或回发客户端标记。The method renders a hyperlink or postback client tag that can submit the form. - 和 方法由单选按钮控件适配器用于引用 单选按钮组中的其他控件。The and methods are used by radio button control adapters to reference the other controls in a radio button group. - 属性 通过类的内部属性提供对组合控件和对象的视图状态的访问 `ClientState` 。The property provides access to the combined control and view states of the object through the internal `ClientState` property of the class. - 控件适配器使用方法来执行特定于设备的文本转换。The method is used by control adapters to perform device-specific text transformation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从类派生一个名为的类 `CustomPageAdapter` 并重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class named `CustomPageAdapter` from the class and override the method. 方法将名为的属性添加 `src` 到超链接，该超链接包含对当前页面的引用。The method adds an attribute named `src` to a hyperlink, which contains a reference to the current page. 在附加到的页面中呈现的所有超链接都 `CustomPageAdapter` 将具有 `src` 属性。All hyperlinks rendered in pages to which `CustomPageAdapter` is attached will have the `src` attribute. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/CS/pageadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/VB/pageadapter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在创建相应的 类或派生类时，在内部构造此适配器。The .NET Framework constructs this adapter internally when it creates the corresponding class or derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection CacheVaryByHeaders { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection CacheVaryByHeaders
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CacheVaryByHeaders As StringCollection

member this.CacheVaryByHeaders : System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection

summary.span: 获取其他 HTTP 标头的列表，对于已附加此派生的页面适配器的网页，缓存将随这些标头而改变。

span.span: Gets a list of additional HTTP headers by which caching is varied for the Web page to which this derived page adapter is attached.

value.span: 包含 HTTP 标头列表的 ，否则为 。

span.span: An that contains a list of HTTP headers; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于 HTTP 标头和其他因素，Web 上的缓存网页的实体缓存多个版本。Entities on the Web that cache Web pages cache multiple versions, based on the HTTP headers and other factors. 例如，生成页面的每种语言的版本通常都是根据 `Accept-Language` HTTP 标头进行缓存的。For example, a version for each language in which a page is generated is typically cached, based on the `Accept-Language` HTTP header. 对于特定的浏览器，可能需要根据 HTTP 标头以及用于控制与目标无关的缓存的标头，来改变缓存。For specific browsers, it might be necessary to vary caching by HTTP headers in addition to the headers that control target-independent caching. 例如，可能需要缓存不同版本的页面以用于不同的屏幕大小。For example, it might be necessary to cache different versions of a page for different screen sizes. 属性返回的标头名称 将添加到 `Vary` 发送到客户端浏览器的 HTTP 标头上的标头列表。The header names returned by the property are added to the list of headers on the `Vary` HTTP header sent to the client browser.

para.span: 从类继承时 ，可以重写 属性以返回附加标头的列表，以控制特定于目标的缓存。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you can override the property to return a list of the additional headers to control target-specific caching.

para.span: 基属性返回 。

span.span: The base property returns .

related.span: 如何：基于 HTTP 头缓存页面版本

span.span: How to: Cache Versions of a Page, Based on HTTP Headers

summary.span: 从 HTTP GET 和 POST 请求获得其他参数的列表，对于已附加此派生的页面适配器的网页，高速缓存将随这些参数而改变。

span.span: Gets a list of additional parameters from HTTP GET and POST requests by which caching is varied for the Web page to which this derived page adapter is attached.

value.span: 包含 GET 和 POST 参数列表的 ；否则为 。

span.span: An that contains a list of the GET and POST parameters; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 上缓存网页的实体会缓存多个版本，而不是其他因素的请求参数。Entities on the Web that cache Web pages cache multiple versions based on, among other factors, the request parameters. 例如，可能会为其生成页面的零售链中的每个商店位置的版本通常基于参数名称进行缓存 (例如 `StoreID`) 。For example, a version for each store location within a retail chain for which a page might be generated would typically be cached based on the parameter name (for example, `StoreID`). 对于特定的浏览器，可能需要除了控制与目标无关的缓存的参数外，还需要通过 GET 或 POST 参数改变缓存。For specific browsers, it might be necessary to vary caching by GET or POST parameters in addition to the parameters that control target-independent caching. 例如，可能需要为不同的移动电话服务提供程序缓存不同版本的页面。For example, it might be necessary to cache different versions of a page for different mobile phone service providers.

para.span: 从类继承时 ，可以重写 属性以返回额外的 GET 或 POST 参数的列表，以控制特定于目标的缓存。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you can override the property to return a list of the additional GET or POST parameters to control target-specific caching.

para.span: 基方法返回 。

span.span: The base method returns .

related.span: 如何：基于参数缓存页面版本

span.span: How to: Cache Versions of a Page, Based on Parameters

summary.span: 获取一个经过编码的字符串，其中包含已附加此派生的页面适配器的网页的视图和控件状态数据。

span.span: Gets an encoded string that contains the view and control states data of the Web page to which this derived page adapter is attached.

value.span: 一个经过编码的 ，其中包含位于相关联的 页面上的控件的组合视图和控件状态。

span.span: An encoded containing the combined view and control states of the controls on the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对类的内部属性的访问 `ClientState` 。The property provides access to the internal `ClientState` property of the class. 由的内部属性中的对象所存储的视图状态数据 `ClientState` 将始终保存在网页上的隐藏字段中。View state data stored by the object in the internal `ClientState` property of will always be saved in the hidden field on the Web page.

para.span: 当从类继承时 ，不能重写 属性，因为它不是 。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you cannot override the property because it is not .

para.span: 若要修改 派生类中的行为，请实现一个 引用基类的属性的新属性 。

span.span: To modify the behavior of in a derived class, implement a new property that references the property of the base class.
Page Adapters and View State
ASP.NET State Management Overview

summary.span: 确定网页是否在回发模式下，并返回回发变量的名称/值集合。

span.span: Determines whether the Web page is in postback and returns a name/value collection of the postback variables.

returns.span: 如果有回发变量，则为回发变量的 ，否则为 。

span.span: A of the postback variables, if any; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回以下集合之一：The method returns one of the following collections: - 如果 HTTP 数据传输方法为，则为窗体变量 `POST` 。Form variables if the HTTP data transfer method is `POST`. - 如果 HTTP 方法为，则查询字符串变量 `GET` 。Query string variables if the HTTP method is `GET`.

para.span: 当从类继承时 ，可以重写方法， 以提供对回发变量集合的目标特定的处理。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you can override the method to provide target-specific handling of the postback variables collection.

returns.span: 未经过验证的窗体数据。

summary.span: 返回一个对象，网页使用此对象来维护控件和视图状态。

span.span: Returns an object that is used by the Web page to maintain the control and view states.

returns.span: 一个从 派生的对象，该对象支持为 创建和提取组合控件和视图状态。

span.span: An object derived from that supports creating and extracting the combined control and view states for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用 方法返回从类派生的对象， 该对象形成并提取组合控件和页的视图状态。The property uses the method to return the object, derived from the class, that forms and extracts the combined control and view states for the page. 如果没有附加到页面的派生页适配器， 则使用对象在页的隐藏字段中维护状态。If there is no derived page adapter attached to the page, a object is used to maintain the state in a hidden field on the page. |链接类型Link type|生成的链接Resulting link| |---------------|--------------------| |代码实体参考，cerCode Entity Reference,cer|| |代码实体引用合格，cerqCode Entity Reference Qualified, cerq|| |代码实体引用特定的，cerCode Entity Reference Specific,cers|| |代码实体引用限定的特定 cerqsCode Entity Reference Qualified Specific, cerqs||

para.span: 的内部属性中的对象所存储的视图状态数据 将始终保存在网页的隐藏字段中。

span.span: View state data stored by the object in the internal property of the will always be saved in the hidden field on the Web page.

para.span: 当你从类继承时 ，你可以重写 方法以返回另一个派生页面状态 persister。如果无法在隐藏 (字段中维护组合状态，则可以重写此方法，例如，因为) 有限的资源。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you can override the method to return another derived page state persister if it is not feasible to maintain the combined state in a hidden field (for example, because of limited resources).

para.span: 基类返回 对象。

span.span: The base class returns a object.

para.span: 您可以使用 类来维护会话状态中的页状态。

span.span: You can use the class to maintain the page state in session state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用 对象维护单选按钮组列表。The class uses a object to maintain a list of radio button groups. 中的每个元素 都是 单选按钮组中的控件的集合。Each element in is a collection of the controls in a radio button group. 方法将控件添加 到相应的集合，创建集合（如果尚不存在），如果没有以前注册的控件，则创建 。The method adds a control to the appropriate collection, creating the collection if it does not already exist, and creating if there are no previously registered controls. 单选按钮控件适配器使用 和 方法来引用 单选按钮组中的其他控件。Radio button control adapters use the and methods to reference the other controls in a radio button group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法写入一个开始超链接标记。The method writes an opening hyperlink tag. 当 `writer` 是 对象时，此标记具有以下格式：When `writer` is an object, this tag has the following format: ```` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从类派生一个名为的类 `CustomPageAdapter` 并重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class named `CustomPageAdapter` from the class and override the method. 将名为的属性添加 `src` 到超链接，该超链接包含对当前页面的引用。 adds an attribute named `src` to a hyperlink, which contains a reference to the current page. 在附加到的页面中呈现的所有超链接都 `CustomPageAdapter` 将具有 `src` 属性。All hyperlinks rendered in pages to which `CustomPageAdapter` is attached will have the `src` attribute. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/CS/pageadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/VB/pageadapter.vb#1)]

span.span: Renders a postback event into the response stream as a hyperlink, including the encoded and possibly encrypted view state, and event target and argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回发事件作为 scriptless 超链接写入。The method writes a postback event as a scriptless hyperlink.

para.span: 从类继承时 ， 如果回发事件超链接需要不同的格式，或者浏览器具有其他独特的要求，则可以重写方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if a different format is required for the postback event hyperlink or the browser has other unique requirements.

para.span: 例如，如果链接要呈现，某些浏览器需要超链接文本为非空。

span.span: For example, some browsers require the hyperlink text to be nonempty if the link is to render.

para.span: 还可以重写 有限资源是否阻止将视图状态作为 URL 参数包括在内。

span.span: You can also override if limited resources prevent including the view state as a URL parameter.

para.span: 基方法不为写入特性 。

span.span: The base method does not write an attribute for .

summary.span: 将回发事件作为超链接呈现到响应流，包括已编码并且可能已加密的视图状态、事件目标及参数、上一页参数和访问键。

span.span: Renders a postback event into the response stream as a hyperlink, including the encoded and possibly encrypted view state, an event target and argument, a previous-page parameter, and an access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回发事件作为 scriptless 超链接写入，其中包括可能分块的 视图状态、 `__EVENTTARGET=target` 、、 `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument` `__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath` 参数和 `accessKey="accessKey"` 属性。The method writes a postback event as a scriptless hyperlink, including the possibly chunked view state, `__EVENTTARGET=target`, `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument`, `__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath` parameters, and an `accessKey="accessKey"` attribute. 如果 `enableViewStateMac` [pages 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100)) configuration 元素的属性设置为，则视图状态为已加密 `true` 。View state is encrypted if the `enableViewStateMac` attribute of the [pages Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/950xf363(v=vs.100)) configuration element is set to `true`.

para.span: 从类继承时 ， 如果回发事件超链接需要不同的格式，或者浏览器具有其他独特的要求，则可以重写方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if a different format is required for the postback event hyperlink or the browser has other unique requirements.

para.span: 例如，如果链接要呈现，某些浏览器需要超链接文本为非空。

span.span: For example, some browsers require the hyperlink text to be nonempty if the link is to render.

para.span: 还可以重写 有限资源是否阻止将视图状态作为 URL 参数包括在内。

span.span: You can also override if limited resources prevent including the view state as a URL parameter.

para.span: 基方法不为写入特性 。

span.span: The base method does not write an attribute for .

summary.span: 将回发事件作为超链接呈现到响应流，包括已编码的视图状态、事件目标及参数、上一页参数和访问键。

span.span: Renders a postback event into the response stream as a hyperlink, including the encoded view state, an event target and argument, a previous-page parameter, and an access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回发事件作为 scriptless 超链接写入，其中包括可能分块的 视图状态、 `__EVENTTARGET=target` 、、 `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument` `__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath` 参数和 `accessKey="accessKey"` 属性。The method writes a postback event as a scriptless hyperlink, including the possibly chunked view state, `__EVENTTARGET=target`, `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument`, `__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath` parameters, and an `accessKey="accessKey"` attribute.

para.span: 从类继承时 ， 如果回发事件超链接需要不同的格式，或者浏览器具有其他独特的要求，则可以重写方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if a different format is required for the postback event hyperlink or the browser has other unique requirements.

para.span: 例如，如果链接要呈现，某些浏览器需要超链接文本为非空。

span.span: For example, some browsers require the hyperlink text to be nonempty if the link is to render.

para.span: 你还可以重写 有限资源是否阻止将视图状态作为 URL 参数包括在内。

span.span: You can also override if limited resources prevent including view state as a URL parameter.

para.span: 基方法不为写入特性 。

span.span: The base method does not write an attribute for .

span.span: A that is the text to transform.

summary.span: 为目标浏览器转换文本。

span.span: Transforms text for the target browser.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含已转换的文本。

span.span: A that contains the transformed text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，可以使用方法将制表符转换 (`\t`) 转换为换行符， (`\n`) 。The method can be used, for example, to transform tab characters (`\t`) into line breaks (`\n`). 基方法返回 `text` 未更改的。The base method returns `text` unchanged.

para.span: 从类继承时 ，可以重写 特定标记是否具有不同于标准 HTML 格式的构造。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you can override if a particular markup has a construct with a different form from standard HTML.

para.span: 例如，如果浏览器需要的标记的标识符不同于在 HTML 中使用的标识符，则 可以重写方法以查找标记并对其进行更改。

span.span: For example, if a browser requires a different identifier for a tag than what would be used in HTML, method can be overridden to find that tag and change it.
